function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global economic contraction due to pandemic impact","Impact":"Job loss, reduced GDP, and shrinking global trade","Mitigation":"Investing in infrastructure, job creation, and economic support measures","Technologies":"Digital platforms for remote work and business operations","People":"Global workforce","Owner":"Governments, international organizations"},{"Description":"Health care sector liquidity and small business support","Impact":"Financial strain on health care sector and small businesses","Mitigation":"Providing financial assistance and liquidity through relief packages","Technologies":"Digital payment systems, online platforms for financial support","People":"Health care workers, small business owners","Owner":"Government, European Union"},{"Description":"Lockdown measures to prevent the spread of the disease","Impact":"Disruption to businesses and economic activity","Mitigation":"Implementing remote work, online services, and support for affected businesses","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, e-commerce platforms","People":"Business owners, employees","Owner":"Government, business associations"}]}
